lab.title: Building an App based on RESTful Services for Oracle Autonomous Cloud Service

modules.title: Module 1: Building your Rest End Points- Creating a Sample Tables and Rest Enabling
Module 2: Building your app which will be based on the rest endpoints - Creating the App
Module 3: Linking the Rest Service defined in the First Workspace- Adding a Web Source for EMP
Module 4: Defining the Report and Form on EMP - Creating Pages
Module 5: Using the Rest Service on DEPT - Defining list of Values
